divs: Sighting DetailsWhile looking out the window, I saw a silver object that must of been many miles away and many feet in the air. The object was reflecting sunlight, so I assume it has a reflective surface. It was moving from NE to NW in a straight line, but slowed down for a bit before moving on. Shortly after, I saw an aircraft following it. I assume it was some kind of government surveillance drone, but I'm not 100% sure.
Summary: It was a silver object moving accross the sky that had sunlight reflecting off of its surface.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around September 25th 2012
